note:
Bigger than a Gen X breadbox, twice as surly. Been around ye olde Internet forever. I'm an ally, a worker for social justice, and a geek. Despite not loving Linux I have a luxurious Linux beard. I hope you like music links and pics of food.

I'm not terribly artistic but I can carry a conversation and can talk about music for hours.

My brain is ABOLUTELY full of 80's New Wave lyrics.

*raised by wolves*

Reno, NV

fields.name: Music
fields.value: #punk #outlaw country #newwave

fields.name: Verily I am
fields.value: CIS but proud to be called an Ally

fields.name: Quote
fields.value: “He said that it was good that God kept the truths of life from the young as they were starting out or else they'd have no heart to start at all.”
